title: Conventional Changelog Types and Scopes Data Schema for HydraLite
description: Schema was adapted from conventional-changelog-types npmjs package, extended by Andrei Jiroh to include commit scopes as part of schema.

commitType.description: Commit types to be shown on the Commitizen wizard and also used for linting commit messages in Commitlint CI.

description.description: Description of an specific commit type when prompted for which type to use in the Commitizen Inquirer.js screen. Try to keep it short as possible.

title.description: Human-friendly name of an specific commit type. Even though it's not required by the schema, it's recommended to include one for documentation purposes.

description.description: Description of an specific commit scope when prompted for which type to use in the Commitizen Inquirer.js screen. Try to keep it short as possible.

title.description: Human-friendly name of an specific commit scope. Even though it's not required by the schema, it's recommended to include one for documentation purposes.
